duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare vehicles for customers and ensure high-quality vehicle readying, including washing and interior cleaning
Operate cleaning equipment and manage paint correction as needed
Track schedules, prioritize, and manage time effectively to meet deadlines
Communicate with various teams involved in the vehicle orientation process
Manage inventory, reorder supplies, and troubleshoot issues as needed

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license, 2-year minimum driving record, and ability to be insured
